column5: 4 brm. 2.5 bath. Sleeps 8. Towels, dishes, cooking utensils. Lake accessible at boat ramp. Quiet neighborhood with deer to feed. In Texas Hill Country, 1 hr from Austin, 1.5 hr from San Antonio, 1 mi. from Horseshoe Bay Resort. Bring your boat.
column8: Come For a weekend Or a Week @ Lake LBJ, Tx!
